meanings.sent1: She felt free and comfortable in her beltless dress.
meanings.sent2: The pants were beltless, so he had to keep pulling them up.
meanings.sent3: The beltless outfit made her feel like a fashion rebel.
meanings.sent4: His beltless look screamed casual and laid-back.
meanings.sent5: The beltless style was a hit at the fashion show.

meanings.sent1: The beltless coat looked sleek and modern.
meanings.sent2: The beltless robe hung loosely on the mannequin.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the beltless pants were on a diet.
meanings.sent4: The beltless jacket was like a hug without arms.
meanings.sent5: The beltless bag was perfect for a minimalist look.
